qualifiers.scope: Determination of maximum lot coverage for development on a lot.
qualifiers.applicability: All lots subject to the cited code sections where lot coverage limits apply.

exclusions.condition: Length from wall to edge is less than or equal to 4 ft

exclusions.item: Uncovered structures less than 30 inches above grade
exclusions.condition: Structure height above adjacent grade is < 30 inches; see condition on railings for porches/decks

ambiguous_language: Includes lists use 'etc.', which are non-exhaustive and may require interpretation.
Scope of 'uncovered structures' is not explicitly defined.

Whether the 'additional 5% coverage' is an increment to the 35% cap or a reallocation within the 35% is implied as an increment but not explicitly stated as 'in addition to lot area'—assumed to be additional on top of 35% of lot area.
Definition of 'covered pool equipment units' is not specified.

variables.name: lot_area
variables.description: Total lot area in square feet

variables.name: structure_footprint_area
variables.description: Footprint area of all structures including main residence and accessory structures

variables.name: projecting_elements_area
variables.description: Plan-view area of projecting elements such as balconies, stairways, porches, patio covers

variables.name: deck_height_above_grade
variables.description: Vertical height of deck surface above adjacent grade

variables.name: roof_overhang_length
variables.description: Horizontal projection of roof overhang/eave beyond exterior wall

variables.name: pool_or_spa_height_above_grade
variables.description: Vertical height of the top of swimming pool or spa above adjacent grade

variables.name: covered_patio_canopy_overhang_area
variables.description: Area attributable to covered patios, canopies, and roof overhangs beyond 4 ft used under the additional allowance

constants.name: base_coverage_max_ratio
constants.description: Base maximum lot coverage as a fraction of lot area (35%)

constants.name: additional_coverage_allowance_ratio
constants.description: Additional coverage allowance for specific covered elements (5%)

constants.name: deck_exemption_height_threshold
constants.description: Decks at or below this height are excluded from lot coverage if other conditions are met

constants.name: pool_spa_exemption_height_threshold
constants.description: Pools and spas at or below this height are excluded from lot coverage

constants.name: roof_overhang_free_allowance
constants.description: Roof overhang/eave length up to this value is excluded; only the portion beyond this counts toward coverage unless using the additional allowance

conditions.logic: total_counted_coverage_area = sum(footprints_of_all_structures) + sum(projecting_elements) + sum(decks_where(deck_height_above_grade > 30 in)) + sum(overhang_portion_where(roof_overhang_length > 4 ft, counted_length = roof_overhang_length - 4 ft)) + sum(pools_spas_where(pool_or_spa_height_above_grade > 30 in))
conditions.description: Elements that must be counted toward lot coverage

conditions.logic: deck_exclusion_condition: A porch or deck with surface height < 30 in above grade is excluded only if railings above 30 in are open (no solid half walls).
conditions.description: Requirement for a porch/deck to qualify as <30 in 'structure' for exclusion
Total counted coverage must not exceed sum of base maximum plus any permitted additional allowance
Additional 5% allowance may only be applied to covered patios, canopies, and roof overhangs beyond 4 ft; cannot exceed either 5% of lot area or the qualifying area actually provided

exceptions.description: An additional 5% coverage is permitted, but only for covered patios, canopies, and roof overhangs beyond 4 ft.
constraints: May not be used for other structure types
Applied area must be comprised solely of the specified elements

relationships.description: Cited code section pages in the source material
Lot coverage is distinct from gross floor area; both limits may apply concurrently

qualifiers.scope: Determination of maximum allowable gross floor area on a lot.
qualifiers.applicability: All lots subject to the cited code sections where GFA limits apply.
ambiguous_language: Criteria for 'second and third floor equivalents' are referenced but not provided here.
Definition and measurement of 'greater than 50% enclosed and covered' are not specified.
Top-level description uses 'visible levels', which may require further definition.

variables.name: lot_area
variables.description: Total lot area in square feet

variables.name: main_structure_floor_area_gross
variables.description: Sum of all floors of the main structure measured to the outside of exterior stud walls

variables.name: stairwells_area
variables.description: Area of stairwells at all floors

variables.name: enclosed_covered_area
variables.description: Areas that are more than 50% enclosed and covered

variables.name: covered_parking_area
variables.description: Area of covered parking (e.g., garages, carports)

variables.name: second_third_floor_equivalent_area
variables.description: Areas that meet criteria for second and third floor equivalents (criteria not provided here)

variables.name: main_house_gfa
variables.description: Gross floor area attributed to the main house

constants.name: gfa_ratio_first_tier
constants.description: GFA ratio applied to the first 5,000 sf of lot area (45%)

constants.name: gfa_ratio_second_tier
constants.description: GFA ratio applied to lot area above 5,000 sf (30%)

constants.name: gfa_first_tier_threshold
constants.description: Threshold lot area for the first-tier ratio

constants.name: main_house_gfa_cap
constants.description: Absolute maximum gross floor area for the main house, regardless of lot size

constants.name: accessory_building_inclusion_threshold
constants.description: Accessory buildings greater than this area are included in GFA

constants.name: enclosure_inclusion_threshold
constants.description: Areas more than 50% enclosed and covered are included in GFA

constants.name: measurement_procedure
constants.description: GFA is measured to the outside of exterior stud walls

conditions.logic: allowable_gfa = gfa_ratio_first_tier * min(lot_area, 5000 sf) + gfa_ratio_second_tier * max(lot_area - 5000 sf, 0)
conditions.description: Calculation of total allowable GFA based on two-tier ratio

conditions.logic: counted_gfa = main_structure_floor_area_gross + stairwells_area + covered_parking_area + sum(accessory_building_area_where(area > 120 sf)) + sum(areas_where(enclosed_covered_percentage > 50%)) + second_third_floor_equivalent_area

conditions.description: Total GFA must not exceed allowable GFA
Main house GFA must not exceed 6,000 sf regardless of lot size
Accessory buildings 120 sf or less are not included in GFA
Areas that are 50% or less enclosed and covered are excluded from GFA

exceptions.description: Even if allowable_gfa exceeds 6,000 sf, the main house may not exceed 6,000 sf.
constraints: Cap applies to the main house only; other structures remain governed by total allowable GFA

relationships.description: Cited code section pages in the source material
Gross floor area is distinct from lot coverage; both limits may apply concurrently
